metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1903 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The gdImageRotateInterpolated function in ext/gd/libgd/gd_interpolation.cin PHP before 5.5.31, 5.6.x before 5.6.17, and 7.x before 7.0.2 allowsremote attackers to obtain sensitive information or cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a large bgd_colorargument to the imagerotate function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.2-1
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.2-1
php7.0 - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-bz2 - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-cgi - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-cli - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-common - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-curl - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-enchant - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-fpm - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-gd - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-gmp - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-imap - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-interbase - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-intl - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-json - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-ldap - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-mcrypt - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-mysql - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-odbc - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-opcache - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-pgsql - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-phpdbg - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-pspell - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-readline - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-recode - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-snmp - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-sqlite3 - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-sybase - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-tidy - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-xmlrpc - 7.0.2-1
php7.0-xsl - 7.0.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0.2-1').
